attacks.name: Berserker Splash
attacks.effect: This attack does 10 damage to each Benched Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's). (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Aqua Tail
attacks.effect: Flip a coin for each Water Energy attached to this Pokémon. This attack does 30 more damage for each heads.
